heading: HR00738
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASES CONVERSION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO INVESTIGATE THE DECISION OF THE BASES CONVERSION DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY AND THE PROCESS BY WHICH IT REACHED ITS DECISION TO EXPROPRIATE LANDS IN BARANGAYS NAPARING, PAGASA, AND PINULOT IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF DINALUPIHAN, PROVINCE OF BATAAN, IN CONNECTION WITH ITS SUBIC-CLARK RAILWAY PROJECT

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASES CONVERSION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO INVESTIGATE THE DECISION OF THE BASES CONVERSION DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY AND THE PROCESS BY WHICH IT REACHED ITS DECISION TO EXPROPRIATE LANDS IN BARANGAYS NAPARING, PAGASA, AND PINULOT IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF DINALUPIHAN, PROVINCE OF BATAAN, IN CONNECTION WITH ITS SUBIC-CLARK RAILWAY PROJECT
